title: Topic 005 Question 019
body: You have a disconnected Azure Stack Hub integrated system that contains custom virtual machine images.
Users will deploy new virtual machines to the integrated system by using Azure Command-Line Interface (CLI).
You create an alias template file.
You need to ensure that the users can reference the virtual machine images by using the names defined in the alias template file.
Where should you store the template file?
options: a blob container hosted in Azure
a blob container hosted on the integrated system
